Author: EngineeringAvalon
Text: Thank you, that is a good idea. Maybe making it the splurge meal will help with the calories guilt.

Author: jazminonacloud
Text: Is there any way you can allow yourself to have one really nice high quality meal while you’re there? That way you don’t feel like you’ve completely deprived yourself but you also still feel in control. Idk that’s tricky, good luck and whatever you decide to do please don’t beat yourself up about it❤️
